Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Business De.KPIS: Number of new business leads generated
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Business De.EXPLANATION: Measures the number of new business leads generated.
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Business De.FORMULA: Total Count of New Business Leads Generated

Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Business De.KPIS: Conversion rate of leads to opportunities
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Business De.EXPLANATION: Measures the conversion rate of leads to business opportunities.
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Business De.FORMULA: (Number of Leads Converted to Opportunities / Total Number of Leads) * 100

Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Business De.EXPLANATION: Measures the revenue growth from new business.
Measures the cost of acquiring new customers.
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Business De.FORMULA: Total Cost of Acquiring New Customers / Total Number of New Customers Acquired

Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Business De.EXPLANATION: Measures the rate of market share growth.
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Business De.FORMULA: (Current Market Share - Previous Market Share) / Previous Market Share * 100

Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Business De.EXPLANATION: Measures the total value of the business development pipeline.
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Business De.FORMULA: Sum of Estimated Revenue from All Active Business Development Opportunities

Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Business De.KPIS: Return on investment (ROI) for business development activities
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Business De.EXPLANATION: Measures the ROI for business development activities.
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Business De.FORMULA: (Revenue from Business Development Activities - Cost of Business Development Activities) / Cost of Business Development Activities * 100

Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Business De.KPIS: Customer lifetime value from new business
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Business De.EXPLANATION: Measures the lifetime value of customers acquired through new business.
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Business De.FORMULA: Average Revenue per Customer * Average Customer Lifespan
